content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! As a conversational AI, I don't have personal preferences or interests, nor do I have the ability to read or look forward to reading books. My purpose is to assist and provide information to users like you!

However, I'm happy to help you discover new books and authors, and I can certainly provide information on upcoming releases if you're interested!

If you'd like, I can suggest some popular book bloggers, authors, and publishers to follow on social media, or provide information on upcoming releases in specific genres. Just let me know what you're interested in, and I'll do my best to help!
